entry.title: AJA News: New Student Section
entry.content:
New Student Section on AJA Website
The AJA has launched a new section on its website geared to college-level students and young professionals at www.ajaonline.org/students. This area is a starting point for research, a place to learn about a career in archaeology or about submitting your first academic article, and a collection of helpful, trusted links to archaeological material.
Topics include:
General Archaeological Resources
 Academic Resources
 Careers in Archaeology
 Project Websites
 Archaeological Blogs
 Multimedia and Interactive

Other Open Access components of AJA include:

 Book Reviews
 Museum Reviews
 Image Galleries
 Supplementary Content
